BUGREPORT.Summary: Enter a date in DD MM YYYY format in the Birth Day field
BUGREPORT.Description: The date in the Birth Day field should be displayed in MM DD YYYY format
BUGREPORT.ActualResult: During the testing process, when manually filling the Birth Day field, you can enter the date in the format DD MM YYYY
BUGREPORT.Stepstoreproduce: 1 Open the Husband tab 2 Click the [New Database] button 3 Enter 25.12.1960 in the field Birth Day
